title: can placements stop being based off of last years rank?
body: why the heck does this even exist? it is useless in every right and placements should be based on what you actually win. me getting placed in bronze 5 even though i win most of my matches is just unfair. I play like a sliver, and i don't climb because carrying toxic, really really toxic players is just impossible. I am tilting off the face of this earth and am going to quit league simply because it makes me more sad that i have to play with crap players. the vote down below is screwed up do don't bother.

replies.body: It's based on last year's rank because that's the best way to stop Diamond 2s and shit from being in the same games as Bronze 4s in early season.

I know the struggle to fight out of bronze. I started season 3 but with dedication and practice I am now Plat 3 almost plat 2 making my way to diamond. Can I do it this year maybe, but I will try my damn hardest.
